notes.title: Author Contributions
notes.p: H.V.D., M.M.M.S., Y.S., Y.M., and K.U. contributed to performance, and analysis of the in vitro experiments, Y.S. and M.A. contributed plant samples. T.Y., M.K. and K.T. performed MSHTS assays. H.V.D., M.M.M.S., and K.M. wrote the manuscript. K.M. designed and supervised the study. All authors have read and agreed to the published version of the manuscript.
